MTM.Summary: Experiencing initial challenges with college coursework.
MTM.Patterns: Struggling with workload, complexity of courses, considering skipping social events
MTM.Goals: Improve study habits, manage time effectively
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to the demands of college life.

LTM.Implications: Marks the beginning of higher education and career path.
LTM.Lessons: Time management, self-discipline, balancing academics with social life

short_term: Will likely improve study habits and time management, leading to better academic performance.
Might consider joining study groups or seeking academic support to manage workload.
long_term: Expected to gain a solid foundation in chosen field, potentially leading to internships or research opportunities.
Could decide on a major or shift focus based on evolving interests and academic performance.

MTM.Summary: Adjusting to new social environment in college.
MTM.Patterns: Mixed feelings about roommate interaction, struggling to make new connections
MTM.Goals: Build new friendships, maintain old ones

short_term: Will work on building new friendships while maintaining connections with old friends through social media or occasional visits.
Might experience some initial roommate conflicts, but likely to improve over time with better communication.
long_term: Expected to develop a close-knit group of friends from college, which will influence personal growth and social dynamics.
Relationships might evolve, with some becoming more significant or transitioning to long-distance relationships.

MTM.Summary: Facing mental health challenges due to college transition.
MTM.Patterns: Existential crises, questioning life choices, overwhelmed by pace

LTM.Implications: Marks a period of self-discovery and potential growth.

short_term: Will start to seek support from campus mental health services or engage in mindfulness practices to manage stress.
Might establish a more consistent sleep schedule to address sleep-related issues.
long_term: Will likely develop better coping mechanisms for stress, leading to improved mental health resilience.
Could explore hobbies or activities that promote well-being, like sports, yoga, or creative arts.

MTM.Summary: Facing financial pressures in a new environment.
MTM.Patterns: Concern over high living costs, feeling broke

short_term: Will budget more effectively and possibly secure a part-time job to alleviate financial pressures.
Might seek scholarships or financial aid to reduce reliance on personal or family funds.
long_term: Expected to learn and implement long-term financial planning, potentially saving for future education or investments.
Could experience financial independence as part-time work becomes more stable or if financial aid is secured.

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on personal happiness and life choices.
MTM.Patterns: Questioning authenticity, comparing expectations with reality
MTM.Transition: Gaining new perspectives on life and self.

short_term: Will continue to reflect on personal happiness, leading to clearer personal values and life goals.
Might engage in philosophical discussions or reading to understand and articulate personal beliefs.
long_term: Will likely develop a more defined personal philosophy, influencing career choices, relationships, and life direction.
Expected to achieve a level of authenticity in personal expression and lifestyle choices.

MTM.Summary: Facing challenges with coding and technology coursework.
MTM.Patterns: Frustrated with coding assignments, struggling with programming languages
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, seek help when needed
MTM.Transition: Overcoming initial hurdles in technology-related studies.

short_term: Will focus on improving coding skills through practice, online courses, or seeking help from peers or tutors.
Might start to find coding assignments more manageable as understanding deepens.
long_term: Could specialize in a particular programming language or technology area, potentially leading to advanced coursework or certifications.
Expected to become proficient in technology-related skills, which could open doors to internships or tech-related career opportunities.
